alert.note: Alert for Chattooga (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 3:01AM EST until January 29 at 9:34AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Chattooga River at Summerville affecting Chattooga County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chattooga River at Summerville. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14 feet, Minor flooding of woodlands and fields begins along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 27 or Rome Boulevard. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 9.4 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early Sunday afternoon to 14.4 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 14 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 315 PM EST.
